content: Holidays at Buena Vista Suites
Make Caribe Royale Your Home for the Holidays

Friends, family, familiar surroundings. It’s what we all love about the holidays. At Caribe Royale, we provide you with the next best thing to home.
This year you’ll enjoy a wide array of exciting dining options perfect for families, plus we’re bringing back many of our popular enhancements sure
to make your stay at Caribe Royale feel a lot like home.

HOLIDAY STUFFED STOCKINGS FOR CHRISTMAS
Save room in your suitcase by purchasing your holiday stockings from us! Surprise the kids this Christmas with a holiday stuffed stocking for just $25 each, plus tax. Each plush stocking will be filled with assorted candies, snacks, and toys, and will be delivered to your suite or villa by Santa’s elves on Christmas Eve night. Place your order today by calling Room Service (aka Santa’s Elves) at (407) 238-8000 ext. 5900 or emailing FBManagement@cariberoyale.com. If you haven’t made your hotel reservations yet, you can also place your stocking order during the reservations process.

SANTA & MRS. CLAUS
We’re expecting a couple of famous visitors this year! Santa and Mrs. Claus will be available in our main lobby (near the gift shop) to meet the kids and hear Christmas wishes. Stop by and enjoy complimentary cookies and take photos with the Claus’ during the following dates and times:

Friday, December 20 from 4:30pm – 7:30pm
Saturday, December 21 from 4:30pm – 7:30pm
Sunday, December 22 from 4:30pm – 7:30pm
